channel.title: Macbook-White on DavidCraddock.net
channel.description: Recent content in Macbook-White on DavidCraddock.net

item.title: Windows 7 Gaming on my Macbook
item.description: I have a 2006/2007 Core 2 Duo 2.6ghz white macbook, that I use regularly for internet, music, watching films, itunes and integration with my iPhone. I wanted to turn my desktop PC into a ‘work only’ Ubuntu Linux machine, so that I don’t get distracted when I’m supposed to be doing something else. But I still have a lot of PC games that I wanted to play on the Macbook, so I decided to try and setup a windows environment to play games on using Bootcamp 2.
